item.description: A Tribute to the late Mai Cramer. Featuredd line-up Guy Davis, Duke Robilard, Toni Lynn Washington, Shirley Lewis REGAL Queen of the Blues, David Marxell, Peter Ward and many more.
item.why: There is a lot going on in May with the Regal Queen of the blues as a part of the happenings around the area. Look forward to seeing you and some or all of these events.
item.name: 05-14-11 Miss Shirley Lewis & Friends Appearing at the Regent Theater, Arlington
